flag.title: Flag of the FlaMaCraft State
flag.description: The state didn't have a flag, back then such a concept wasn't even thought about.

taxes1.title: Description of the taxation system of the FlaMaCraft State
taxes1.description: It says: "Armorless = 0%, Iron Armor = 30%, Diamond Armor = 75%. Netherite Armor = 100%".

taxes2.title: Table of the taxation system of the State of FlaMaCraft per person
taxes2.description: On the left column, a number of people is stated. And on the right collumn is written how much diamonds would a person pay per week.

unknownhead.title: Head of the player bettim
unknownhead.description: We can't find their profile, and have no memory of him or his skin- so if you manage to remember, find or are him, contact us.
